original_title: Hello Kittys Paradise - Fun With Friends
overview: Kitty and her twin sister Mimmi share fun adventures with their friends and family. Along the way, they learn important lessons every little boy and girl should know: how to share, how to count, all about safety, table manners and much more. Stories include "The Magic Bags", "The Dust Monster", "Put on a Happy Place", "The Train to Grandma's House", "Paper Play", "Sizing Things Up", "The Broken Robot" and "What's in Store?".
title: Hello Kittys Paradise - Fun With Friends
